Job Description.165:
Company Description
Chotot is part of Carousell, one of the world’s largest and fastest-growing marketplace platforms in Southeast Asia. We are now operating in eight countries with values exceeded US$1 billion. By leveraging technology, Chotot aims to create a smart marketplace that empowers Vietnamese daily life. As the first recommerce platform and a pioneer in classified 4.0, we believe that we can build a one-stop site to meet all wants and needs of all Vietnamese in all stages of their life.
Job Description
We are seeking a talented and experienced Senior AI Engineer to join our mission. As an AI Engineer, you will be responsible for building innovative solutions that help users to buy and sell items effectively. Key areas of the DS team are recommendation & search systems, product authorities, fraud detection, trust and safety, pricing models, and user segmentation.
In this role, you will collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of engineers and scientists to explore, design, build, and deploy state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms. You will also be responsible for ensuring high-quality ML services are delivered at scale, and delivering impactful results for our users.
With a focus on delivering results and making a real impact, you will play a key role in driving the success of the Data Science team and our platform as a whole.
Take the lead in initiatives, research, and realize solutions to improve Chotot business by applying Machine Learning / Deep Learning technologies and knowledge. 
Develop and own metric measurements to assess the quality and performance of ML services
Responsible for the full cycle of ML development: including data collection, training, deployment, production monitoring, and model quality control
Translate data insights into compelling narratives that support data-driven decision-making at both tactical and strategic levels
Communicate and influence senior management, and executive team members 
Qualifications
The ideal candidate will have a degree in computer science, mathematics, or a related field, with a minimum of 5 years of experience in machine learning and a strong background in recommendation systems. You should be highly-skilled in programming and have experience working with large data sets and distributed systems.
Have experience in building, and maintaining machine learning services related to e-commerce industry that scale to millions of users (Recommendation system, Search, Pricing, User segmentation…etc)
You have practical experience in deploying ML solutions to production (on a public cloud) with demonstrable real business impacts
Experience crafting, conducting, analyzing, and interpreting experiments and investigations.
Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and statistics 
Proficiency in one of the deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch
Expertise in Python, experience in bash shell scripts, UNIX utilities
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes and familiar with microservices, event-driven architecture.
Practical working experience with GCP cloud technologies (AI Platform, Vertex AI, GKE, Cloud Run, Cloud Function) is a plus
Must have excellent verbal and written communication skills, have the ability to deliver concise, actionable solutions
Additional Information
By proceeding with your application, you are adhering to our PDPA policies. In case you are interested to know more, read about our Candidates Personal Data Privacy Statement.
Job Description.166:
Hi, I'm Yoav, the Artificial Intelligence Engineering Manager at EnsoData! I'm looking for a Deep Learning Engineer passionate about making healthcare better through designing and implementing deep learning systems that power EnsoData's products and services. Our new team member must be focused on helping team members deliver outstanding user experiences. This position may be hybrid/remote and offers a salary of $100k-$150k, stock options, unlimited vacation, opportunities for family and caregiver time away, healthcare, and more.

EnsoData
Our goal at EnsoData is to provide artificial intelligence powered software services that create massive cost and time savings for frontline clinicians, allowing them to spend more time with patients and less time with data, improving both patient and provider satisfaction and patient outcomes. Our first product, EnsoSleep, uses our machine learning engine with big data to save clinicians hundreds of hours per month by automating one of the most arduous and repetitive data annotation tasks in all of healthcare - sleep study scoring.

Mission
The mission for the Deep Learning Engineer is to use one's expertise in deep learning to cover a full spectrum of activities to optimize EnsoData's artificial intelligence. The person in this position will collaborate with others using his/her/their knowledge to apply deep learning techniques to contribute to EnsoData's products and services, ultimately contributing to advances in healthcare. The person in this position has the opportunity to grow personally and professionally to help build a world-class team, own critical EnsoData product initiatives, and serve as a key member of the EnsoData technical team.
Requirements
Job Competencies
Algorithm: Design knowledge
Machine learning: Demonstrated experience applying ML to real world problems
Deep learning: Modern deep learning libraries (tensorflow, keras) as well as experience in implementing state-of-the-art deep learning architectures and training paradigms such as CNNs, RNNs, transformers, contrastive learning, multi-task learning, GANs, etc. is required
Distributed Training: Previous experience with training models in a distributed environment utilizing cloud TPUs
Excellent Python development skills in multiprocessing, distributed systems, and big data environments
Ability to communicate in a remote environment that strives to be diverse and inclusive

Company Culture
Gets things done - bias toward action
Goes above and beyond - intrinsically motivated
Self-sufficient - excited about autonomy
Doesn’t cut corners - integrity and attention to detail
Shares knowledge - understands the value of good documentation and mentorship
Spreads good vibes - fun to work with and is a great teammate
Delights customers - comfortable working closely with customers and puts them first
Passionate - possesses a strong desire to make healthcare better
Benefits
The benefits package includes, but is not limited to, the following:
Remote and flexible schedule - we have a headquarters in downtown Madison, WI but remote work and flexible schedules are supported. In case you didn't know, Madison has consistently been ranked as one of the top places to live in the US (businessinsider.com, money.com, livability.com)!
Health, dental, and vision insurance with options to choose a plan that fits you and your dependents needs.
Unlimited vacation and sick time - we want our employees to rest, recharge, and feel better.
Stock options - we want team members to feel ownership in the organization. When EnsoData does well, you do well.
401k to help people invest in the future.
Team Summits! A few times of year everyone gathers in person to enjoy a few days together and participate in team events such as a volunteer activity. (Hint: check out our blog for info from former team weeks and conferences!)

Interested?
We'd love for you to apply if you have...
3-5+ years work and/or project experience with machine learning systems development, particularly in healthcare applications
Deep understanding and experience with applying cutting edge machine learning, artificial intelligence, statistical and data science algorithms, methods, techniques, and approaches
Ability to apply advanced signal processing and statistical analysis techniques for physiological signals, time series, and sensor data formats
Experience managing production ML systems on GCP or cloud environments
Experience working in a HIPAA-compliant environment is a bonus
Education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Sciences, Engineering, or a related discipline required; Master's or PhD preferred

Interview Process
Submit a resume online and our human resources and hiring manager will choose those that seem like the best candidates.
We look forward to meeting you face-to-face! A few candidates will be chosen for a 30-minute video call to get to know each other, discuss your experience, and explain the position in more detail.
Expect a take-home challenge to show your skills.
The final candidate(s) will participate in a video interview to meet other members of the team.
Offer!

Let’s talk
EnsoData seeks to recruit, hire, and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool. Research shows that while men apply to jobs when they meet an average of 60% of the criteria, women and other marginalized folks tend to only apply when they check every box. If you think you’re a great fit, but don't necessarily check every box on the job description, please still get in touch.
To learn more about our ongoing commitment to diversity, check here.

Equal Employment Opportunity
EnsoData is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate on any basis of race, color, national, social, or ethnic origin, gender, pregnancy, or childbirth, gender orientation, identity, or expression, sexual, relationship, or romantic orientation, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, family or parental status, age, past or present military service, physical, mental, or sensory disability, medical condition, genetic information, religion, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. EnsoData will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. We value, celebrate, and support diversity, inclusion, and our differences. We are committed to providing a safe work environment and a company culture of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates. We seek to recruit, hire, and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool. We strongly encourage women, people of color, LGBTQIA+ individuals, people with disabilities, members of ethnic minorities, intersectional individuals, foreign-born residents, and veterans to apply. We have deep conviction that diversity and inclusion among our teams, our communities, and our physical and virtual workplaces is vital to the success of EnsoData’s mission to improve healthcare access, outcomes, and affordability for patients and communities everywhere globally.
Job Description.167:
Location: U.S. (New York, NY preferred)
About AlphaSense: 
AlphaSense is a market intelligence platform used by the world's leading companies and financial institutions. Since 2011, our AI-based technology has helped professionals make smarter business decisions by delivering insights from an extensive universe of public and private content—including company filings, event transcripts, news, trade journals, and equity research. Our platform is trusted by over 3,500 enterprise customers, including a majority of the S&P 500. Headquartered in New York City, AlphaSense employs over 1,000 people across offices in the U.S., U.K., Finland, and India. For more information, please visit www.alpha-sense.com.
About the Role: 
We are seeking a passionate research engineer to join our AI team.  The AI team develops the cutting edge deep learning, NLP, search and recommendation algorithms that power AlphaSense Search and AI products. You’ll work closely with a team of talented researchers and engineers to deliver scalable solutions for our world class AI powered search platform. 
Who You Are:
Ideally, you possess an advanced degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field with a focus on deep learning and NLP
Familiar with the state-of-the-art deep learning and natural language processing research
Hands-on experience working on Large Language Models (LLM) and generative AI is required. You have developed LLM from data collection to deployment. Preferably you have contributed to LLM related publications or open source projects.
You are proficient in Python and familiar with deep learning frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow, and libraries like Spacy and HuggingFace
An excellent communicator with strong organizational, problem-solving, debugging and analytical skills
What You’ll Do: 
Develop highly scalable deep learning models such as LLM and take them all the way to production
Perform cutting edge research in deep learning & natural language processing
Work closely with cross-functional teams to translate product requirements into machine learning architectures
Own systems end-to-end including design, code, training, testing, deployment and iteration
AlphaSense is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to a work environment that supports, inspires, and respects all individuals. All employees share in the responsibility for fulfilling AlphaSense’s commitment to equal employment opportunity. AlphaSense does not discriminate against any employee or applicant on the basis of race, color, sex (including pregnancy), national origin, age, religion, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, military or veteran status, disability, or any other non-merit factor. This policy applies to every aspect of employment at AlphaSense, including recruitment, hiring, training, advancement, and termination.
In addition, it is the policy of AlphaSense to provide reasonable accommodation to qualified employees who have protected disabilities to the extent required by applicable laws, regulations, and ordinances where a particular employee works.
Base Compensation Range*:  $148,000 - $230,000 
Additional Components: You may also be offered a performance-based bonus, equity, and a generous benefits program.
*For base compensation, we set standard ranges for all US-based roles based on function, level and geographic location, benchmarked against similar stage growth companies and internal comparables. In order to be compliant with local legislation, as well as to provide greater transparency to candidates, we share salary ranges on all job postings regardless of desired hiring location. Final offer amounts are determined by multiple factors including geographic location as well as candidate experience/expertise and may vary from the amounts listed above.
Job Description.168:
Company Description
At Bosch, we shape the future by inventing high-quality technologies and services that spark enthusiasm and enrich people’s lives. Whether in areas of Automated Driving, Electric & Connected Mobility, IoT or Connectivity, our ideas make driving safer and more comfortable than ever before. This is only possible with the help of our colleagues from Bosch Engineering Center - with offices in Cluj and Bucharest - specialized in software, hardware & mechanics and reliability engineering. We work closely together with other international mobility development teams and with the local Bosch Cluj Plant in order to offer unique products and AIoT solutions to our clients from around the world. 
So, are you ready to shape the future of the mobility together with us? Let us tell you more. Our promise to our associates is rock-solid: we grow together, we enjoy our work, and we inspire each other. Join in and feel the difference.
Job Description
The domain focuses on data-driven products and service development for mobility area. Smart services for mobility are also provided in the context of creating high performance teams
Technology stack:
Python
SQL
Apache Hadoop
Apache Spark 
Azure, Mongo, SQL
Docker
Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn, etc.
Version source control (e.g. Git, Bitbucket)
Qualifications
Data mining and Statistical Analysis
Data Visualization
Machine Learning
Artificial Intelligence
Data preprocessing
The languages you should know:
English – a good level is mandatory
Additional Information
#LikeABosch Benefits:
Your work-life balance is valuable to us, so we offer you:
25 Days of annual leave, because work-life balance is essential to us;   
Flexible working hours, but if you want to work from somewhere else, feel free, our Home Office program helps you do that; 
Your health and well-being is important to us, so we have you covered:
Medical subscription
Accident insurance
Sport activities and well-being initiatives
We believe in a Life-Long Learning approach, so you can take advantage of:
Technical and soft skills trainings;
Access to e-learning platforms
Local and Global career development programs
Opportunity to attend conferences
Bookster subscription
You will be part of a product company. You will contribute to developing end-to-end products that are delivered to Global OEMs.
On top of these, we are offering:
A monthly budget which can be used for several different services on an online benefit platform
Annual bonus
Lunch discounts
Ready to work #LikeABosch?
We live by our values, have an open feedback culture and there is plenty of room for innovative ideas. All because a team is only as valuable as its members.
Job Description.169:
Description de l'entreprise
CleverConnect est une scale-up franco-allemande de la HR Tech en forte croissance fondée il y a 10 ans par des ingénieurs. Présents dans 4 pays européens (France, Allemagne, Italie et Espagne), nous poursuivons notre développement à l’international. Depuis la fusion avec Talentry en 2022, nous partageons l’ambition de devenir le leader des software solutions du Talent Acquisition en Europe. 
Notre mission est de fournir des solutions HR utiles à (et aimées 🤟 par) des millions de candidats grâce à des technos de pointes et innovations (Machine Learning, Video Interview...) et une expérience simple et intuitive.
Pour cela, nous mettons en relation les recruteurs et les candidats avec des solutions digitales et des plateformes SaaS innovantes pour rendre le processus de recrutement plus efficace. Nos technologies permettent aux candidats de trouver des opportunités plus ciblées et de valoriser leur personnalité et motivation 🔎
Ainsi, chaque année nous accompagnons 10 millions de candidats à trouver le job qui leur convient 👌
Rejoignez notre équipe internationale de 300 collègues qui partagent la même culture et les mêmes valeurs, et qui sont pleinement engagés dans un projet à fort impact sociétal 💚
Découvre nos équipes 😜 avec la vidéo suivante : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I0nQgqM9Jkk&feature=emb_title
Description du poste
Pour accompagner notre forte croissance, nous recherchons un Project Manager AI/NLP pour rejoindre nos équipes de talents qui partagent une passion commune pour les services distribués, la scalabilité, le déploiement continu et l’intelligence artificielle. 🚀
Au sein de notre équipe Tech dynamique, vous êtes en charge de gérer les projets d’évolution de nos référentiels de données utilisés dans nos outils d’intelligence artificielle, facilitant la correspondance entre un candidat et une offre.
Plus précisément, en tant que Project Manager AI NLP, en lien avec nos data scientists mais aussi avec nos différents Product Managers 👩‍🚀👨‍🚀:
Projet :
Vous êtes en mesure de comprendre les besoins linguistiques et fonctionnels de notre plateforme au service du monde de l’emploi.
Vous participez à la construction de référentiels de données, plus exactement les taxonomies, correspondants aux besoins des talents et des entreprises qui utilisent notre plateforme : métiers, compétences, diplômes, etc. dans un contexte multi-langues.
Coordination d'équipe : 
Vous avez en charge le management hiérarchique de 3 ingénieur(e)s linguistes.
Vous mettez en place des indicateurs de performance pour le suivi de la production des ingénieurs linguistes internes à CleverConnect.
Vous participez activement aux recrutements d’annotateurs sous-traitants gérant des tâches d’annotation et de labellisation de textes.
Vous proposez des méthodes & des métriques de suivi et de planification des annotateurs et vérifiez la qualité des résultats. 
Vous savez éditer des instructions claires et efficaces pour partager une tâche linguistique complexe à une personne extérieure à votre domaine d’expertise.
Votre travail aura un impact sur la manière dont des millions de candidats vivent leur recherche d’emploi.
Qualifications
Doté d'au moins 3-5 ans d'expérience en tant que Project Manager :
Vos aptitudes relationnelles vous permettent de communiquer aisément avec les équipes d’ingénieurs, les clients mais aussi les freelancers qui participent à l’effort de notre équipe.
Vous êtes ouvert à des formations internes, que ce soit sur un plan technique ou sur un plan structurel.
Vous êtes force de proposition et contribuez à enrichir la dynamique de votre équipe par votre expérience acquise et votre compréhension du monde du travail et de la recherche d’emploi.
Vous maitrisez parfaitement le français et l’anglais (oral et écrit), Vous connaissez idéalement une autre langue telle que l’espagnol, l’italien, l’allemand, le portugais ou le néerlandais.
Une expérience professionnelle dans un autre pays que la France est un plus.
Techniquement 💪🧠 
Vous maitrisez le pack Office (ou équivalent) et d'un ou plusieurs outils de gestion des tickets,
Les méthodes de gestion de projet n’ont pas de secret pour vous.
Les certifications Prince2 ou PMI (PMP ou CAPM) sont un plus.
Poste basé à Paris ou Lille. 
Informations supplémentaires
Vous pensez comme nous que la technologie permet la création de solutions simples et élégantes à des problèmes complexes.
Chez CleverConnect, nous vous offrons un environnement dans lequel l’autonomie, la confiance et la collaboration sont favorisées pour permettre à chacun de se surpasser et de repousser les limites afin de fournir des solutions innovantes. 
CleverConnect c’est aussi :  
Une forte croissance et une solidité financière 🔥
Une équipe dirigeante accessible, bienveillante et à l’écoute 
Des bureaux au cœur des villes et la possibilité de faire du télétravail 🏠
Des opportunités de formation, d’évolution et de mobilité en Europe 
Des cours de yoga, des urban trails et des événements sportifs 🏃
De nombreux afterworks et 2 séminaires par an 🎉
RTT, mutuelle, carte déjeuner, remboursement 50% transport, forfait mobilité durable
Job Description.170:
Opis oferty pracy
Zespół marketingu to ponad 100 osób, na którego efekty pracy każdego dnia patrzą miliony osób odwiedzających Allegro. Pracujemy na dużą skalę, Allegro to ponad 13 milionów klientów rocznie! Stosujemy analizy i nowe rozwiązania pozwalające nam oceniać efektywność per kanał, na całej długości lejka konwersji. 
Data Scientists w zespole marketingu tworzą rozwiązania oparte na Data Science/Machine Learning. Pracę w naszym zespole charakteryzuje różnorodność, zarówno pod względem analizowanych tematów, jak i wykorzystywanych technik modelarskich i technologii. To świetne miejsce dla osób oczekujących okazji do ciągłego rozwoju i unikalna szansa zdobycia multidyscyplinarnej wiedzy na temat działalności platform eCommerce - choćby w zakresie:
Ilościowego określenia wpływu kanałów marketingowych na sprzedaż przy wykorzystaniu techniki marketing mix modelling
Optymalizacji wydatków marketingowych wykorzystujących modelowanie behawioralne CLV (customer lifetime value)
Analizy ścieżek klientów w oparciu o teorie gier i łańcuchy Markova
Prognozowanie ruchu klientów na stronie internetowej
Modeli scoringowych oraz churn
Szukamy osób, które:
Mają doświadczenie w samodzielnej pracy na stanowisku Data Scientist lub podobnym
Potrafią przetwarzać dane i tworzyć modele machine learning w języku Python (np. scikit-learn, pytorch, tensorflow, xgboost, catboost, light-gbm, pandas)
Znają i rozumieją algorytmy uczenia maszynowego i potrafią je stosować w praktyce, oraz są chętne i zdolne do nauki nowo powstających algorytmów
Znają bardzo dobrze SQL i mają doświadczenie lub interesują się analityką w ekosystemie GCP/Hadoop
Potrafią klarownie się komunikować z jednostkami biznesowymi - od sformułowania problemu analitycznego do przejrzystej i intuicyjnej prezentacji wyników
Posiadają naturę badacza, który umiejętnie rozkłada złożone problemy na części składowe i skutecznie je modeluje
Mają dużą chęć do nauki i rozwijania wiedzy
Znają język angielski na poziomie co najmniej B2
Ze swojej strony oferujemy:
Model pracy hybrydowej, który ustalisz z liderem i zespołem. Mamy świetnie zlokalizowane biura ( z w pełni wyposażonymi kuchniami i parkingami dla rowerów) i znakomite narzędzia pracy (podnoszone biurka, interaktywne sale konferencyjne)
Bonus roczny do 10% wynagrodzenia rocznego liczony z kwoty brutto (zależny od Twojej oceny rocznej oraz wyników firmy)
Bogaty pakiet świadczeń pozapłacowych w systemie kafeteryjnym – Ty decydujesz z czego korzystasz (do wyboru mamy m.in. pakiety medyczne, sportowe, lunchowe, ubezpieczenia, bony na zakupy)
Zajęcia angielskiego opłacane przez nas i skoncentrowane na specyfice Twojej pracy
Pracę w zespole, na którego wsparcie zawsze możesz liczyć -  na pokładzie mamy najlepszych specjalistów i ekspertów w swojej dziedzinie
Dużą autonomię w organizacji pracy zespołu, zachęcamy do ciągłego rozwoju i próbowania nowych rzeczy
Hackathony, turystykę zespołową, budżet szkoleniowy oraz wewnętrzna platforma MindUp (m.in. szkolenia z zakresu organizacji pracy, sposobu komunikacji, motywacji do pracy oraz różnych technologii i zagadnień merytorycznych)
Jeśli chcesz wiedzieć więcej - sprawdź sam/a
Na czym będzie polegać Twoja praca?
Będziesz budować modele rozwiązujące problemy biznesowe - predykcyjne, segmentacyjne, prognostyczne, rekomendacyjne, a także wykorzystywać metody optymalizacyjne
Będziesz wykorzystywać szeroką gamę rodzajów modeli, w tym modele boostingowe, deep learning, metody Bayesowskie, wnioskowanie przyczynowe, metody optymalizacji
Będziesz przetwarzać duże zbiory danych w GCP lub Hadoop/PySpark
Będziesz miał/a szansę popracować nie tylko z danymi tabelarycznymi, ale również przestrzennymi, tekstami w języku naturalnym, obrazami, szeregami czasowymi
Będziesz brał/a udział we wdrożeniach modeli działających off-line i on-line
Dlaczego miał(a)byś z nami pracować?
Data Science pełni kluczową rolę w działaniu Allegro - jesteśmy firmą technologiczną opartą na danych, a poprzez dostarczane modele i analizy będziesz miał/a istotny wpływ na działanie jednej z największych platform eCommerce na świecie
Dzięki szerokiej gamie realizowanych przez nas projektów nigdy nie zabraknie Ci ciekawych wyzwań
Będziesz miał/a dostęp do ogromnych zbiorów danych i najnowszych technologii ich przetwarzania
Będziesz miał/a możliwość praktycznego nauczenia się narzędzi i technologii: Python, MLFlow, GCP BigQuery, Composer, Dataflow, PySpark, Hadoop
Nauczysz się dobrych praktyk programistycznych, inżynierskich i zarządzania kodem
Dzielimy się naszą wiedzą na konferencjach i szkoleniach branżowych, jesteśmy aktywnym uczestnikiem i współtwórcą społeczności Data Science/Machine Learning w Polsce i na świecie
Wyślij nam swoje CV i sprawdź dlaczego #dobrzetubyć
Job Description.171:
Company Description
Customer Experience & Sales (CX & Sales) is a newly established global cross-functional and customer-centric function within the H&M Brand focusing on delivering outstanding customer experience. CX & Sales has a key role in enabling us to reach our brand direction, to become the leading destination for style, creativity and culture. As part of the Consumer & Customer Research team, you will be right at the center of this shift towards a truly customer-centric organization.  
Retail and space planning and analytics exist to enable data-driven insights on how to capitalize on space in our stores to drive comparable growth net selling. This is where you come in! As a Data Scientist within Retail Space Planning & Analytics you will be the key enabler to explore and develop new robust methods to get new and more accurate insights on consumer demand and space in stores. This is a temporary assignment during parental leave, and an opportunity for you to take your skills to a new level! 
Job Description
 As a Data scientist you will perform analysis on large sets of data to extract impactful insight. This will inform and guide Retail Space Planning / Analytics and Store Experience & Commercial to drive strategic decisions across the H&M functions as well as H&R leap related to Store portfolio profiling, assortment visibility and assortment activation. Your work will contribute to scale up on data-driven insights enabled by statistical and mathematical methods. You will work with multiple advanced analytics tools to analyze, execute and follow-up initiatives from start to finish. Your stakeholder will be on a cross-functional level, and an important part of the role will be interacting and influencing the analytical community within H&M to explore and enable new data areas to acknowledge more business potential. 
Qualifications
We believe you have experience from working in a data scientist role in a cross-functional setting, as well as at least 2-3 years experience in data science, data analysis or machine learning engineering within retail, or equivalent. In addition to this we believe you have the following: 
A university degree in a relevant field; (e.g. Mathematics, Statistics, Science, Engineering) 
Possess the technical competence to perform advanced analytics, including data modelling and coding skills (R, Python and SQL required, additional languages meriting) and analytics tools experience  
Capability of tackling very loosely defined problems and working autonomously  
Have a business and customer-oriented mindset with the motivation to constantly improve, achieve targets and drive agenda forward 
Like taking responsibility and enjoy working in a changing environment 
Are curious, prestige-less and always strive to find the best way forward 
Strong communicative skills and fluent/skilled in English, both written and spoken 
Additional Information
What we offer!       
Besides the obvious perks such as staff discount card, flexible work life, learning communities, wellness benefits, parental benefits etc. you are joining a unique value driven culture, a large tech and analytics network and community where you can be yourself. There are endless opportunities to experiment and grow in any direction that you want and when you grow, we grow. 
This is a temporary assignment to cover a 12 month long parental leave. You will be based in Stockholm in our newly renovated office in downtown Stockholm. You will report to Retail Space Planning & Analytics Manager, Store Experience & Commercial, CX&S . Fluency in English is mandatory, Swedish is not. If you believe your experience, skills and ambitions are right for this role and you want to join an exciting journey and a fantastic team, please upload your CV as soon as possible but at the latest 26th of February 2023.  
Due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our career page. 
For questions about the position and/or recruitment process, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Haben Zeriet at haben.zeriet@hm.com
Job Description.172:
Company Description
Informa is a leading academic publishing, business intelligence, knowledge and events business, creating unique content and connectivity for customers all over the world. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a member of the FTSE 100.
Taylor & Francis Group produces high quality, peer reviewed books and journals. We produce unique, trusted content by expert authors, spreading knowledge and promoting discovery globally. We aim to broaden thinking and advance understanding, providing academics and professionals with a platform to share ideas and realise their individual potential.
Job Description
Overall Role Summary:
Are you interested in the practical application of Artificial Intelligence to solve problems in the real-world?  Are you interested in being part of a team that quickly brings new ideas to life?  Do you thrive on the challenges related to exploring the art of the possible?  Are you experienced in getting new products and solutions to the market quickly?  If so, consider joining our AI innovation team.
The role of AI Engineer / Analyst / Specialist (depending on seniority) will join our team of technologists responsible for incubating new and novel software/data initiatives that drive growth and explore new markets for Taylor & Francis. This role operates within the Taylor & Francis technology organisation and reports to the Director of Artificial Intelligence Innovation. We are looking for an experienced AI practitioner to join the team, using data science, machine learning and AI technologies to help us improve various business outcomes and drive innovation. Our focus is on Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Neural Networks, Large Language Models, Knowledge Graphs, and Multi-Modal Generative AI.
Key Accountabilities
Collaborate with a cross-functional team to experiment with different ML/AI technologies, in large part related to Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Knowledge Representation (KG), to solve crucial business problems.
Understand and help refine the requirements of new products, services, and concepts.
Support the development of AI/ML-based prototypes, MVPs, and new products.
Qualifications
Knowledge and Qualifications
Hands-on prototyping and R&D in AI -- but we will look at candidates of exceptional skills and acumen independently of their seniority (compensation will be related to seniority).
Required: Proven knowledge of AI and NLP, including Python and common tools such as Github, Pandas, Numpy, Sklearn, NLTK, PyTorch, Tensorflow, GPT, BERT, SageMaker, etc.
Also required: Entrepreneurial spirit, autonomy, teamwork, explorative skills (agile / lean, need discovery), comfortable with ambiguity and uncertainty, problem solving, results oriented, a doer. Must have a proven history of progressing from concept to MVP quickly and iteratively.
Proven expertise in one or more of the following areas will capture our attention:
Knowledge Graphs, Graph DBs (neo4j, AWS Neptune), graph AI (e.g., PyKEEN, neo4j DS, etc.);
AI-based data deduplication, conditional merging, entity disambiguation and linking;
 Mastering of AWS MLOps (SageMaker Studio, S3, ECR, Lambda), DVC, data engineering and big data technologies (e.g., ELT/ETL, Hadoop, Spark, AWS EMR, etc.);
 Text generation (GPT 3/3.5, etc.), advanced text summarization, multi-modal generative AI.
Also appreciated: ElasticSearch, Mongo DB, Postgres, Java, Scrum, Jira, knowledge of academic publishing processes
Additional Information
What we offer in return:
·       25 days annual leave
·       4 volunteering days annually
·       Day off for your birthday
·       Pension contributions
·       Seasonal social and charitable events
·       Training and development
At Taylor & Francis we care about our colleagues, promoting work-life balance, wellbeing and flexible working. We believe that the skills and experience you bring to Taylor & Francis are invaluable. We want you to have the opportunity to develop your abilities, and to innovate and develop in areas which you are passionate about.
Additional Information:
You must have the right to work and live in the UK
This role is based at our Milton Park, Oxford office or may be remote
The role involves in Occasional UK/international business travel (up to 4/y).
We would like to thank all applicants in advance and regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified

Taylor & Francis Group an Informa Business
Informa is a leading academic publishing, business intelligence, knowledge and events business, creating unique content and connectivity for customers all over the world. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a member of the FTSE 100.
Taylor & Francis Group produces high quality, peer reviewed books and journals. We produce unique, trusted content by expert authors, spreading knowledge and promoting discovery globally. We aim to broaden thinking and advance understanding, providing academics and professionals with a platform to share ideas and realise their individual potential.
To find out more about our business and the great career opportunities please go to our Careers Site: http://www.taylorandfrancisgroup.com/careers
We know that sometimes the 'perfect candidate' doesn't exist, and that people can be put off applying for a job if they don't fit all the requirements. If you're excited about working for us and have most of the skills or experience we're looking for, please go ahead and apply. You could be just what we need! We believe strongly in the value of diversity and creating supportive, inclusive environments where our colleagues can succeed. As such, Informa is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, colour, ancestry, national origin, religion, or religious creed, mental or physical disability,
medical condition, genetic information, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, and related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, citizenship, or other protected characteristics under local law.
Job Description.173:
Every day, tens of millions of people come to Roblox to explore, create, play, learn, and connect with friends in 3D immersive digital experiences– all created by our global community of developers and creators. 
At Roblox, we’re building the tools and platform that empower our community to bring any experience that they can imagine to life. Our vision is to reimagine the way people come together, from anywhere in the world, and on any device. We’re on a mission to connect a billion people with optimism and civility, and looking for amazing talent to help us get there. 
A career at Roblox means you’ll be working to shape the future of human interaction, solving unique technical challenges at scale, and helping to create safer, more civil shared experiences for everyone.
As a Principal Deep Learning Engineer, you'll be building deep learning models and algorithms to solve computer vision problems across Roblox. The mission of the applied machine learning team is to build advanced machine learning solutions to solve problems across Roblox. The team is currently working on advanced recommendation systems and computer vision models. With daily active users growing at a record rate, we are looking for experienced machine learning engineers who are passionate about designing and building deep learning solutions to power Roblox's products.
You Will:
Design and implement deep learning based computer vision solutions that address problems across Roblox.
Author specs for new features and improvement
Collaborate with other teams within Roblox to make sure we are building products with community and company first mindset.
Balance researching new technologies with a practical approach to realize the research efforts into the Roblox products
Interface with the industry and communities where applicable and be ambassador for Roblox.
Work in our San Mateo office.
Reporting to the Senior Manager of Personalization.
You Have:
7+ year experience in designing and building deep learning solutions to solve computer vision problems. Capable of breaking down product requirements into iterative deliverable stages. Experience in launching computer vision models into production.
A degree in Computer Vision, Deep Learning, or a related field. You have solid fundamentals in Computer Vision and Deep Learning.
You Are:
A Leader: You have initiated and facilitated challenging technical decisions across multiple teams and organizations. You are empathetic, and find common understanding.
User oriented: While deeply technical, you always start with the needs of the user, whether they are Roblox users or internal engineers.
Versatile: You're a jack of all trades and you have mastered several languages and technologies already; you can easily adapt to any situation.
Creative: You take a creative and strategic approach to solving hard problems. You simplify the complex. You bring in fresh ideas from new places.
#LI-Onsite
For roles that are based at our headquarters in San Mateo, CA: The starting base pay for this position is as shown below. The actual base pay is dependent upon a variety of job-related factors such as professional background, training, work experience, location, business needs and market demand. Therefore, in some circumstances, the actual salary could fall outside of this expected range. This pay range is subject to change and may be modified in the future.  All full-time employees are also eligible for equity compensation and for benefits.Annual Salary Range$283,780—$331,640 USD
You’ll Love: 
Industry-leading compensation package
Excellent medical, dental, and vision coverage
A rewarding 401k program
Flexible vacation policy
Roflex - Flexible and supportive work policy 
Roblox Admin badge for your avatar
At Roblox HQ: 
Free catered lunches five times a week and several fully stocked kitchens with unlimited snacks
Onsite fitness center and fitness program credit
Annual CalTrain Go Pass
Roblox provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.
Job Description.174:
Company Description
Do you want beneficial technologies being shaped by your ideas? Whether in the areas of mobility solutions, consumer goods, industrial technology or energy and building technology - with us, you will have the chance to improve quality of life all across the globe. Welcome to Bosch.
Job Description
Job Description
Atleast 5+ years of experience on Data Science
Good knowledge of advanced statistical methods. Mine and analyze data, applying statistical methods as necessary, pertaining to customers’ discovery, and viewing experiences to identify critical product insights.
Experience in creating statistical models and/or optimization frameworks for improving processes/products/profits
Proactively develop new metrics and studies to quantify the value of different aspects of product.
Translate analytic insights into concrete, actionable recommendations for business or product improvement. 
Partner closely with product and engineering leaders throughout the lifecycle of project. Ensure that necessary data is captured; analytic needs are well-defined up front and coordinate the analytic needs.
Drive efforts to enable product and engineering leaders to share your knowledge and insights through clear and concise communication, education, and data visualization.
Should have independently handled a project technically and provided directions to the other Team Members. 
Experience in turning ideas into actionable designs. 
Able to persuade stakeholders and champion effective techniques through development. 
Ongoing technical authority role with our larger customers.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills: ability to tell a clear, concise, actionable story with data, to folks across various levels of the company.
Able to lead the project independently.
Technical directions to junior in team, like to sort the respective task for responsible team members 
Technical Skills:
Expertise with any of the below skills:
Python, Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch
NLP, WordNet, NLTK, OpenCV
Tech savvy and willing to work with open-Source Tools
Applying statistical and machine learning techniques, such as, mean-variance, k-means, nearest-neighbor, support vector, Bayesian time-series and network analysis to identify outliers, classify events or actors, and correlate anomalous sequences of events.
Proven track record and experience with statistical modeling/data mining algorithms such as
Multivariate Regression, Logistic Regression, clustering algorithms, Support Vector Machines, Decision Trees etc
Machine learning, deep learning, graph mining.
DOE, Forecasting, Segmentation, Uncertainty Analysis etc.
Data Mining i.e. Text Mining, Classification Methods – SVM, NN, etc
Vector Space model for Unstructured Texto Sentiment Analysis, Association Mining, Semantic Analysis
Should know some programming language and willing to learn more.
Qualifications
Qualifications
MTech, BTech, BE or MCA
